thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Giant Network Involving 218.9 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Giant Network Involving 218.9 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shenzhen exchange filing shows block trade of giant network involving 218.9 mln yuan

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Stock Exchange :
* FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF GIANT NETWORK GROUP CO LTD'S 6.6 MILLION SHARES INVOLVING 218.9 MILLION YUAN ($33.64 million) ON JAN 11 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2grA0v1 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5081 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
